actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to encourage national consumer effort to save gas and arrive alive.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that drivers of motor vehicles should be encouraged to travel at a speed no greater than ten miles per hour less than the posted speed limit, on any road where the posted speed limit is fifty-five miles per hour or greater.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to encourage national consumer effort to save gas and arrive alive.
